event.title: #DayAgainstDRM Conference of Dr. Richard Stallman on Digital Restrictions Management in Genova, Italia

body.p:
Venue: Sala della Società di Letture e Conversazioni Scientifiche. Palazzo Ducale. Piazza De Ferrari. Genova
- Time: 17:00 - 20:00 - Program: 17:00 Welcome 17:00 Marco Ciurcina remembers Stefano Rodotà. 17:30 Conference of Richard Stallman * 18:30 Debate and questions 19:00 Answers by Richard Stallman 19:30 Conclusions
* the speech will be in English with a sequencial translation into Italian by Daniela Vigatti
Free entrance.
19:45 #DayAgainstDRM flashmob for digital rights with STOP DRM banner in Piazza De Ferrari.
Contact the organizers at info(at)softwareliberoliguria.org
